ourStory.title: our story
ourStory.paragraph: Enab Beirut is the story of every Lebanese house, the most famous Lebanese chain of restaurants in Egypt and Cairo, in terms of authentic Lebanese food and juices in the Lebanese way. The place is very quiet to relax and change the mood with the Lebanese house decor. Enab Beirut .. the story of every Lebanese house

our1.heading: Private Dining
our1.pargraph: Our chain of restaurants offers calm, private dinners and enjoyment of Lebanese food

our2.heading: Well Service
our2.pargraph: We have the best workers in the field of tourism and the most skilled chefs in providing a distinctive service worthy of the name of Enab Beirut

our3.heading: Fast Delivery
our3.pargraph: We are also distinguished by the fast delivery service, Lebanese food and juices, in the comfort of the customer

our4.heading: Various Menu
our4.pargraph: Our menu features more than a variety of Lebanese food and drinks menus

album.head: #Enab_Beirut
album.pragraph: Enjoyed your stay at Enab Beirut? Share your moments with us. Follow us on Instagram and FaceBook

footer.pargraph: Lebanese ambiance with Lebanese decor for dining, bar! Experienced staff are waiting to give you a unique dining experience.
